Texts.Chs: 什么，你以为我在撒谎？哦，得了吧。虽然看到你以极限速度撞击地面会很有趣，但它不会告诉我任何我不知道的关于你的事情。 ^green;今晚见！^reset;
Texts.Eng: What, you thought I was lying? Oh, come on. While seeing you impact the ground at terminal velocity would be funny, it wouldn't tell me anything about you I don't already know. Anyways, ^green;see you tonight!^reset;

Texts.Chs: 你知道你应该怎么做吗？^red;跳下就在你面前的那个悬崖！^reset;我保证你不会死得很痛苦，很狼狈。
Texts.Eng: You know what you should do? ^red;Jump off that cliff right in front of you!^reset; I promise you won't die a painful, messy death!
